title: Ashampoo Anti-Virus 2015 v1.2.1 MultiLang Cracked-AMPED
description:
Ashampoo Anti-Virus 2015 v1.2.1 MultiLang





With powerful automated real-time protection and frequent updates, Ashampoo Anti-Virus 2015 offers reliable protection against all common Internet security threats, known and unknown. And it does so in a very discrete and unobtrusive manner without restricting your freedom of use.

Heavy on security but light on resources:
Advanced protection also for non-advanced users:
Always up to date and always protected:

Protection that works

Once installed, you don't have to configure Ashampoo Anti-Virus 2015. Sophistcated real-time protection including our powerful behaviour blocker comes right out of the box. Simply install and forget.

Heavy on security but light on resources

Ashampoo Anti-Virus 2015 offers strong real-time protection against virus, trojan, spyware and other security threats to prevent attacks as they happen. But Ashampoo Anti-Virus 2015 does not sacrifice speed over security. Where other solutions will slow down your computer, Ashampoo Anti-Virus 2015 manages to stay lightweight and take up very little resources.

Advanced protection also for non-advanced users
Despite sophisticated technology, Ashampoo Anti-Virus 2015 is surprisingly simple to use. It was specifically designed to restrict the need for user interaction to a minimum. Think of Ashampoo Anti-Virus 2015 as a highly-skilled bodyguard that autonomously handles dangerous situations with as little user intervention as possible.

Always up to date and always protected

With daily signature updates, your Ashampoo Anti-Virus 2015 is always ready to detect and neutralise both old and new threats. And best of all, updates happen fully automatically.
